products.name: Exploro Primo
products.headline: The world's first aero gravel bike

products.name: Exploro Racemax Italia
products.headline: Fastest speed on gravel, made in Italy

products.name: Exploro Extrema Italia
products.headline: For the worst gravel and the most comfort, made in Italy

highlights.introHeading: If you’re like us, you love riding in rough terrain but live in a more urban jungle. So you need a bike that is fast on-road and capable off-road.
highlights.tireHeading: Gravel riding is all about tire choice and the 3T Exploro models fit the widest possible tires, up to 61mm. But each model is optimized for a different purpose.
highlights.highlightHeading2: The Exploro pioneered aerodynamics for gravel bikes, including even mud-covered knobby tire wind tunnel testing (much to the chagrin of the wind tunnel staff). The race-proven Exploro range gives you the speed you’re used to on asphalt and an additional advantage on wind-swept gravel tracks.
